verses.roman:
jīva-gosāñi gauḍa haite mathurā calilā
nityānanda-prabhu-ṭhāñi ājñā māgilā

synonyms: jīva-gosāñi—Śrīpāda Jīva Gosvāmī; gauḍa haite—from Bengal; mathurā calilā—started for Mathurā; nityānanda-prabhu-ṭhāñi—from Śrīla Nityānanda Prabhu; ājñā māgilā—he asked permission.
translation: When Jīva Gosvāmī wanted to go to Mathurā from Bengal, he requested permission from Śrīla Nityānanda Prabhu.
